name: Human-in-the-Loop UAV Mission Planning
author: Lu Feng
Laura Humphrey
Ufuk Topcu
description: This model was part of the multi-objective benchmarking suite for QComp 2023 [0]. We consider an unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV) that interacts with a human. The UAV performs road network surveillance. See [1] for more details

parameters.name: Unf
parameters.description: 0: Don't unfold any rewards, 1: Unfold the value rewards, 2: Unfold all rewards

properties.name: performant_bounded
properties.description: The maximum probability of success while staying in time bounds.

properties.name: performant
properties.description: The maximum probability of success without exceeding time.

properties.name: performant_safe_bounded
properties.description: The tradeoff between the maximum probability of success and minimising dangerous situations, while staying in time bounds.

properties.name: performant_safe
properties.description: The tradeoff between the maximum probability of success and minimising dangerous situations, without exceeding time.
